name: Tubers of Fate
description:
You're a halfling, just trying to exist.

Meanwhile,the Dark Lord rampages across the world.

You do not care about this.

You're trying to farm potatoes.

Because what could a halfling possibly do about it anyway?

This is a text-only implementation of Oliver Darkshire's "Potato" one-page TTRPG for the Apple II.

It could also be easily ported to any platform with BASIC.

The easiest way to play right away is probably to download the .txt version and paste it on this Javascript emulator.

Picture on real hardware provided by George Caswell!
